item.title: CentOS7 yum安装lamp环境
item.description: 1.安装apache 🔗 yum install httpd #根据提示，输入Y安装即可成功安装 systemctl start httpd.service #启动apache systemctl stop httpd.service #停止apache systemctl restart httpd.service #重启apache systemctl enable httpd.service
